long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Canvas Class Average takes all your course's assignment averages and finds the class average adjusting for assignment group weight. It also keeps track of grade history, showing you how your score and the class average has changed over time.

If your university is not currently on the allow list please submit a request at the following link:
https://github.com/da-stoi/canvas-class-average/issues/new?assignees=da-stoi&labels=URL+Add+Request&projects=&template=url-add-request.md&title=URL+Add+Request
